definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
high in score but low in ability (as a result of teaching to the test)

sentences.english: Natural biopolymer assembly mechanism and functionalization.
sentences.chinese: 天然生物高分子聚集機制與功能。

sentences.english: Looking at the higher and lower ends of the distribution, Hyde and her colleagues again found no meaningful differences between the genders.
sentences.chinese: 而在高分端和低分端，男女的分佈也幾乎一樣。

sentences.english: The physical and chemical properties of the carbon black are detected, and its microstructure is analysed by High Revolution Electromicroscopy (HREM) and X-ray Diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 射線衍射和高分辨率透射電鏡分析了樣品的微觀結構。

sentences.english: The experimental parameters of spectrograph for high resolution (HR) spectroscopy are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了高分辨率光譜實驗的光譜儀參數。

sentences.english: Shear flow is one of the significant parts of the rheology of polymer blends.
sentences.chinese: 剪切流動是高分子共混物流變學的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: The researchers found that higher scores on a measure of chronic loneliness were associated with an increase in warmer baths or showers.
sentences.chinese: 研究者發現較高分的慢性寂寞和溫度較高的洗浴有關。

sentences.english: Built-in high efficiency mini-breaker or low voltage plastic enclosure breaker.
sentences.chinese: 內裝高分斷小型斷路器或低壓塑殼式斷路器。
你以高分通過數學測驗。

sentences.english: Formal training programs and military doctrine also got good marks.
sentences.chinese: 正規訓練和軍事操典項也得高分。

sentences.english: Ring-opening metathesis polymerization(ROMP) is one of the most important part in the field of polymer synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 開環易位聚合反應是高分子合成領域引人注目的目標。

sentences.english: A high-resolution CT scan can also be performed to look at the temporal bones for dehiscence.
sentences.chinese: 高分辨率的CT檢查也能用於檢查顳骨是否開裂。

sentences.english: The result is that Chinese college graduates often have high scores but low ability.
sentences.chinese: 結果是，中國的大學畢業生通常高分低能。

sentences.english: New high-resolution satellite imagery, however, appears to belie the general's statement.
sentences.chinese: 但是，新的高分辨率衛星照片卻否定了將軍的說法。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a new method of forming macromolecule self-assembled monolayers.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一種形成高分子自組裝膜的新方法。

sentences.english: The advances of side-chain polymeric liquid crystals as GLC stationary phases are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了側鏈高分子液晶作爲氣相色譜固定液的進展。

sentences.english: His superiority over his contemporaries was considerable and he held many records for the highest marks ever achieved in competition.
sentences.chinese: 洛加尼斯創下了許多比賽中的最高分紀錄。

definition: to pass an exam or a test/to meet a minimum standard
passing line or score (in an examination)
to grade/to mark (student's work)/grade/score (of student's work)
(old) thanks to your lucky influence (polite reply to health inquiries)
TOEFL/Test of English as a Foreign Language
cotyledon of a bean (i.e. either of the halves of a bean seed that can be split apart after removing the seed coat)/thick bean sauce (abbr. for 豆瓣醬|豆瓣酱[dou4 ban4 jiang4])
horizontal line (in a fraction)/minimum passing score
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
